bibl.title: Guilloche Drawings on a Potsherd. A Contribution to the Designing of the Theban Hermitage Wall Decoration.
bibl.note: Hermitage in Theban tomb 1152, potsherd bearing drawings of three different guilloche. - 1. Upper guilloche E. - 2. Center guilloche F. - 3. Lower guilloche.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences
